edu.harvard.hms.dbmi.bd2k.irct.controller

Class QueryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.hms.dbmi.bd2k.irct.controller.QueryController

  • public class QueryController
extends java.lang.Object
    This a stateful controller that creates queries and ensures that the predicates, selects, and other attributes added to them are created correctly. NOTE: NOT ALL CHECKS ARE IMPLEMENTED NOTE: NOT ALL METHODS HAVE BEEN FULLY IMPLEMENTED AND VETTED
    Author:
    Jeremy R. Easton-Marks

      • addWhereClause

        public java.lang.Long addWhereClause(java.lang.Long sqId,
                                     java.lang.String logicalOperator,
                                     Path field,
                                     java.lang.String predicateName,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> values,
                                     java.lang.Long whereId,
                                     Resource resource)
                              throws ClauseNotFoundException,
                                     ClauseIsNotTheCorrectType,
                                     SubQueryNotFoundException,
                                     LogicalOperatorNotFound,
                                     PredicateTypeNotSupported
        Adds a where clause to a given query or subquery
        Parameters:
        sqId - Subquery Id if applicable
        logicalOperator - Logical Operator
        field - Field
        predicateName - Name of the predicate
        values - A map of values
        whereId - If replacing an existing one
        resource - Resource to run against
        Returns:
        The where clause id
        Throws:
        ClauseNotFoundException - Clause not found
        ClauseIsNotTheCorrectType - Clause is not of the correct type
        SubQueryNotFoundException - Could not find the subQuery requested
        LogicalOperatorNotFound - Logical Operator not found
        PredicateTypeNotSupported - Predicate type is not supported by the resource
